extendedInfo.description: ***Now optimized for Xperia PLAY devices!***---With more than 800,000 downloads across all platforms, A Space Shooter for Free continues to deliver endless fun and alien annihilation to its fans! To celebrate the near-million-player mark, Commander P. Jefferson has decided to award you, for a limited time only, ONE MILLION remnants! Use this newfound wealth to pimp your ship, upgrade your cannons, and get your alien-killinâ on! WHATâS NEW:- Sponsor Pay integration : earn free remnants!- New achievement system- ONE MILLION remnants giveaway, for a LIMITED TIME!- Donât forget the NEW WEAPON weâve added! Starfire is still available in stores!***Embark on a hilarious journey through space as Commander P. Jefferson, an alien-hating starfighter at the helm of the mighty USS Eradicator.The critically acclaimed Space Shooter franchise, with nearly one MILLION downloads across all platforms, is now available for FREE!A Space Shooter for Free delivers hilarious, irreverent action with a download price thatâs hard to beat! Combining retro-style shoot âem up gameplay, high-resolution graphics, and intuitive touch screen controls, A Space Shooter for Free provides hours of alien-blasting entertainment. ***For those craving an even more intense experience, a 99 cent in-game upgrade to the BIGASS version will let you enjoy a slew of additional boss fights, difficulty levels as well as devastating additional special weapons.***A Space Shooter for Free players will:- BATTLE hundreds of enemies across two galaxies.- EXPERIENCE fast-paced, retro-gaming action with incredible detail.- ENGAGE in epic boss fights that allow you to keep their special weapons once defeated.- ENJOY two ways to play: A hilarious campaign-based story mode and a skill-testing survival mode.- LAUGH at more than 25 minutes of fully voiced, hilarious cutscenes.- VISIT Jennaâs shop to purchase more than 40 upgrades and power-ups or maybe just do some flirtingâ¦- DOWNLOAD the full version, unlocking even more boss fights, difficulty levels and special weapons for a one-time 99 cents in-game purchase.What the Critics say:âA Space Shooter stands apart because of its high degree of polish and production valuesâ - Appolicious âAmazing! A solid arcade game with an old-school twist!â - IGNâThe value proposition is dynamiteâ - Touch ArcadeâIn brief, this is totally awesome!â - ipadappcafeâExplosions, machismo and explosions of machismo!â - 148appsâ9/10 Itâs funny, itâs fun!â - brutalgamer.com"A Space Shooter for free is a solid iOS game" - tuaw.comVisit our website for additional information!

reviews.title: Good, humorous game. Even better that it\'s free!
reviews.comment: Good humorous game, even better cos its free!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Extremely addictive hours of space shooting fun!! One of the few new games I really look forward to playing. Always trying for new power-ups and higher scores. A real \'blast\'!! The fun is in it\'s simplicity.\tHours of entertainment if you like comedy shooting games.
reviews.author: Daniel Redman

reviews.title: Top 10 best game!
reviews.comment: Awesome game! This game is fun and very addictive. Graphics are great and dialogue is hillarious!!! 5 stars all the way!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Decent top down shoot \'em.  Gameplay is slightly dull, but one liner humor is pretty good.  Stuff in store is priced well.  Things are not WAY expensive like other games.  You won\'t be forced to buy currency or upgrades.
reviews.author: John Holmes

reviews.title: Gr8 Shmup game
reviews.comment: Shmup! Helluva humor, addictive game play, smooth controls and good fun. Music needs to be better. Only downside is it is only a demo. and has only 4 free maps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice. Real nice.
reviews.comment: Nice, Real nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Really good game! Very good story line too with good humor. Fun to play anytime!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love it.  Love the characters.   One of the more responsive shooters I\'ve played.\tLove this game!   Funny characters, responsive ship controls, lots of mayhem.
reviews.author: Michael Pate

reviews.title: Passive gamer
reviews.comment: I loved this game! It\'s quick to learn and easy to play and the flavor of the character is amazing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hours of fun!
reviews.comment: Dialogue is hilarious, game control is great, graphics rock...all around fun, fun, fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Its a great shoot and go! Super simple and anyone can play it! Love this game!
reviews.author: Tim Perkins

reviews.title: byrdman777
reviews.comment: Ok game. Needs some improvement with the controls. Gets hard to play when the ship gets under my thumb. Even changing to \"Relative\" in control options does not help much. Still pretty good game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great fun game
reviews.comment: Awesome shooter, no problems yet. One of the best games of the hundreds ive played. Def. Worth the dollar to unlock full game
reviews.author: Erik Draven

reviews.title: Galaxy y
reviews.comment: Super addictive and super fun! lets c how soon I finish all the fee levels before I have to buy full version...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fair play , a bit sloppy
reviews.comment: Need sensitivity improvement, it doesn\'t follow the finger well but good game
reviews.author: Metar Chomsuwon

reviews.title: Big nel lfc
reviews.comment: Big Nelly- excellent playability..love these type of space shooters....more please! Liverpool fc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bruce
reviews.comment: Wish i had the option to rate this game, but Unfortunately after i watched all the story and info at the start it would then just go back to the home/menu screen and unable to start anything, just lets me go on the menu settings and do wats usually on your main screen. Please fix dying to play!!.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NOT XPERIA PLAY OPTIMIZED
reviews.comment: Only the touch controls work. Trying to move the dpad at all moves it to the bottom of the screen then nothing. Only the circle button does something (asks you if you want to quit).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME!!! Great shooter space game. Love the animation and narration
reviews.comment: Awesome! Love the shooting, animation and narration
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Scam demo
reviews.comment: Just one level demo you beat in 5 minutes, then need to buy the game to continue.
reviews.author: Damian Parsons
